heading: Carrion Fields Dungeon Guide
content: Carrion Fields is fast dungeon with simple monster families, leading to a quick completion time. It holds the for Barbarians, and can even be split farm in a group for faster completion! Keep an eye on this dungeon: if it ever becomes a Nightmare Dungeon, then you'll want to save your sigils! While every dungeon has a somewhat randomized layout, there are patterns to where objectives and bosses are located. This map will help you identify those layouts so you can complete dungeons faster and maximize your XP and loot per hour! Reviewed by
